channel.title: Announce that someone has Just Voted?
channel.description:
I followed this tut on adding Vote4Cash: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476829.msg3487607.html#msg3487607
&& I was wondering how I could make it where when they receive theyre award that it will shout or yell to the server that "PlayerName" Has Just Voted and Received 50m! Vote for you can receive your Award" Something like that.. If you can help me out please do.

item.title: Announce that someone has Just Voted?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:11, topic:405869”]It had to start somewhere, non efficient code, adding everything to process being called every 500 ms, lack of organization, Delta started bad programming habit’s and stuck to them thus making a shitty popular base.[/quote]ah okay, never touched a delta

Read full topic

item.title: Announce that someone has Just Voted?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:7, topic:405869”]Yes it work’s, but may I ask where you learned your programming practice from and who taught you to use non efficient code?
That my friend is a bad habit, and is what created delta.[/quote]
Shit… Well, all i did was get the code from xxDestructionxx and rip half of it and just added it to that… didn’t notice it was non efficient. And i barely even know anything about programming i just know the basic codes of PI and some other stuff. People like you are how i learned, like this command that i just learned :D. Also tutorials and snippets i learned alot from that, i’ve watched some Java Tutorials, but got lazy and stopped.

Read full topic

item.title: Announce that someone has Just Voted?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Why have a empty string???
And you’re not declaring the type right, it should be called as a static reference.
Lord people…

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("reward")) {
			for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
				if (player != null) {
					final Client c2 = (Client) player;
					c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has just voted.");
					if (c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You have not yet voted, type ::vote to do so");
					}
				}
			}
		}

Read full topic
item.source: Announce that someone has Just Voted?

item.title: Announce that someone has Just Voted?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

just add it after it adds the items, once the checkvotes has confirmed they have voted.
Or you can just add a command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("reward")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client p = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; p.sendMessage(""+c.playerName+" has just voted!!"); if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); } else { c.sendMessage("You have not yet voted, type ::vote to do so"); } } } }

Read full topic
